backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the APK store backend with user profile management, APK listing CRUD operations, and role-based access control (users can add listings, admins can update/delete, guests can view).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that the APK upload button and modal were updated to be visible to all logged-in users (not just admins), referencing the relevant frontend files and test ID REQ-11.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to short summaries describing each file's purpose, serving as a reference document for the frontend codebase.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the UI.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell with a root div and module script entry point for the React app, titled 'Ameer Hamza'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that wraps the app in QueryClientProvider, composes the main layout (Header, HeroBanner, ListingsPage, Footer), conditionally shows ProfileSetupModal for new users, and renders a dark-themed Toaster.
frontend/src/components/ApkCard.tsx: Card component that displays APK metadata (icon, name, category badge, description, mod features, version, file size, download link) with a dark cyberpunk neon-green theme and fallback avatar for missing icons.
frontend/src/components/ApkUploadModal.t: Modal form for submitting new APK listings, accessible to all authenticated users, with fields for all ApkMetadata fields and error handling that prompts login rather than admin role.
frontend/src/components/CategoryTabs.tsx: Filter tab bar component rendering All/Games/Apps buttons with item counts, styled with neon green active state and dark inactive state.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, quick navigation links, feature highlights (safe/fast/free), copyright, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky top navigation header with logo, nav links, an authenticated-only Upload APK button, and login/logout functionality via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/HeroBanner.tsx: Displays a full-width hero banner image with an overlay showing the site title, description, and feature badges (free downloads, verified safe, latest versions).
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users to enter their name and save a user profile before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/SearchBar.tsx: Controlled search input component with a search icon and a clear button, used for filtering APK listings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: React Query hook that fetches the currently authenticated caller's user profile from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: React Query hook that checks whether the currently authenticated user is an admin by calling the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on APK listings and saving user profiles, all delegating to the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up a dark cyberpunk theme using Tailwind, defines OKLCH CSS variables for colors, imports Inter and Space Grotesk fonts, and adds custom utilities like neon glow shadows and scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/ListingsPage.tsx: APK listings page that fetches all listings via a custom hook, supports real-time search and category filtering, and renders APK cards in a grid with loading skeletons, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean sensitive params from the URL without reloading.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom dark/neon color tokens, neon box-shadow variants, Space Grotesk/Inter font families, and animation keyframes for accordion and neon pulse effects.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file (schema v1.0.0, version 7) that records implemented features, requirements, and architectural notes for the Ameer Hamza APK Mod website.
